thread.section_title: StorageMart Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of StorageMart | storage-mart.com | 2 of 215
thread.title: Bob Callan

author: Bob Callan
title: Bob Callan
text: I was greeted with the most friendly and kind individual at the desk as I walked in. Within minutes we had discussed what I needed it for and Anna had a few options for me which was super helpful. In the past I have rented a few storage units from competitors and have never felt so satisfied. Anna runs an amazing storage and her level of customer service is the best I've seen.
